keyword: how many calories in a tic tac
title: How Many Calories in a Tic Tac?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in a tic tac, including carbs, sugars, and full nutrition breakdown for this popular mint candy.
h1: How Many Calories in a Tic Tac?
assumptions: Standard original Tic Tac mint candy, approximately 0.49 g per piece, no wrappers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand batch, and exact size; values are approximate. Check packaging for precise info.

quick_answer.text: A single Tic Tac contains about 2 calories, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a tic tac?
Are Tic Tacs high in sugar?
faqs.a: One Tic Tac has about 0.5 g of sugars, low but adds up with multiple pieces.

faqs.q: Do Tic Tacs have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: No protein or fat; calories come entirely from carbohydrates.

faqs.q: How many Tic Tacs in a serving?
faqs.a: A typical serving is 3-4 pieces, totaling around 6-8 calories.

faqs.q: Does flavor affect calories in Tic Tacs?
faqs.a: Most flavors are similar at 2 kcal per piece, but check labels for variations.
